channel.title: Enrisep Source problems (new Coder)
channel.description:
so i am new to coding because i love rsps, and want to get to know java better so i want to make a server to mess around with myself.
i am getting this error, i have absolute no clue what to do so someone please help
[ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION [Region] DONE LOADING REGION CONFIGURATIONS [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: Launching Enrisep By Zero... [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: Exception in thread "main" [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
thank you

item.title: Enrisep Source problems (new Coder)
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

xplode:

i want to make a server to mess around with myself.

Lmao.

But IfearI is correct, you must be already running a copy of the server, if not, some type of application or Windows service is binded to that port. First check and see if you’re already running the server, if you don’t see it running, try opening Task Manager and and any processes that say “javaw.exe”. Next, think of any applications that could be using port 43594, some examples: Skype, uTorrent, Steam, etc. Close out any programs that could be using this port, and try again. If that doesn’t work, open command prompt (Start > Run… > cmd) and type in netstat -n, this will show what applications are binded to what ports. Close the associated applications if any of them are using 43594. If that doesn’t work, let us know.

Read full topic

item.title: Enrisep Source problems (new Coder)
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

[quote=“xplode, post:1, topic:544174”][ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION
[Region] DONE LOADING REGION CONFIGURATIONS
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: Launching Enrisep By Zero…
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: Exception in thread “main” [6/21/14 10:12 AM]:
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind <------------------------------------------------------
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc
e)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r
egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a
ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W
orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP
reservingRunnable.java:51)
[6/21/14 10:12 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Wow… I’m seeing the same question over and over again lately.

OT: It tends to appear when you are already running a server (?) since you can’t bind 2 “servers” to the same port.

Read full topic
